You're a traveler, right? Then you must be pretty good at fighting against pirates. Now please do something against them!

What am I saying? Well, remember last time, a whole bunch of #o5120501#s invaded my farm? While I was busy protecting my farm against them, someone else walked into the farm and stole other herbs!! You'll never understand how painstaking it was to grow and nurture those herbs. I am pretty sure it's the work of those pirates!

Those pirates!!! It angers me greatly that they made a huge mess out of this farm, but for them to steal the herbs... they will pay for this! I want you to teach those pirates a lesson or two by defeating #r80 #o6130208#s#k and #r80 #o7130104#s#k!
You call yourself a traveler when you are unwiling to help those in need? I don't see the difference between you and the pirates.
Hoh! Thank you for eliminating both #o6130208#s and #o7130104#s. I'm sure they learned the lesson; they won't do it again... I sure hope so. Great work there!

Those pirates only stole the most expensive herbs available. At least they have an eye for the herbs... but those herbs aren't for them! Those were for #p2091002#. I'll never get these robbed again. Ever.
